definition: to hide/to dodge/to avoid
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

to hide/to evade/to dodge/to take shelter/to avoid (difficulties)
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to evade/to dodge (out of the way)

to dodge/to evade
to evade/to dodge (out of the way)
to evade/to dodge (out of the way)
to dodge a creditor
to be in hiding
to be in hiding
to step aside (for a passing vehicle)/to get out of the way/to make way for

lit. to avoid the wind/fig. to keep low to avoid a difficult situation/to stay out of trouble

to dodge a creditor

sentences.english: He tried to avoid meeting me like plague since he had resigned.
sentences.chinese: 自从辞职后，他就如避蛇蝎般地躲着我。

sentences.english: While the White Swan comes easily to Nina, the dark mysteries of the Black Swan evade her.
sentences.chinese: 当白天鹅靠近妮娜的时候，黑天鹅的隐秘躲在暗处。

sentences.english: Or she might avoid going to the doctor to avoid confirmation of her fears.
sentences.chinese: 或许她可能会躲着医生，以避免当面确认她的恐惧。

sentences.english: The foolish fox was frightened and fell in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 那只愚蠢的狐狸受到惊吓，躲在了树林里。

sentences.english: It's kind of like a little wall of straw that you hide behind.
sentences.chinese: 就是用稻草堆起来的一堵小墙，人躲在其后。

sentences.english: They returned in turn to bury the luxuries burnt in the burst.
sentences.chinese: 他们顺次返返来埋躲在爆炸中销毁的豪侈品。

sentences.english: The man fled to the mountains to avoid the conscription.
sentences.chinese: 为了逃避募兵，那个人躲到山里去了。

sentences.english: They hid themselves behind some bushed for fear that the enemy should find them.
sentences.chinese: 他们躲在灌木丛后面，以防敌人会发现他们。

sentences.english: Many of the people of Darwin escaped by hiding in cellars that night.
sentences.chinese: 那晚，达尔文市的许多市民是躲在地窖里逃过此劫的。

sentences.english: It was raining heavily, whether or not we should choose to hide in the refuge.
sentences.chinese: 雨上的很小，人们能否当要挑选藏正在躲威严港外。

sentences.english: The crew found safety at the bow of the boat.
sentences.chinese: 船员们都到船头安全的地方躲了起来。

sentences.english: At the time i had a lawyer on payroll and i hid behind the action.
sentences.chinese: 当时在工资表上我雇有一个律师，我躲在幕后。

sentences.english: THERE are few safe places to ride out an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 没有几个地方是那么的安全，可以躲得过地震。

sentences.english: Qinghai Province is located west China, northeast Qinghai-Tibet Plain.
sentences.chinese: 青海省位于中国西部，青躲高原东北部。

sentences.english: This crowd who could hide and, once again, eat you.
sentences.chinese: 这喧嚣谁能躲得及，再一次，侵蚀你。

sentences.english: The youngest, who was in the clock-case, was the only one he did not find.
sentences.chinese: 只有躲在钟盒里的那只最小的山羊没有被狼发现。
